00119                         return _name.toString();

00121 
00122                 /* a queue slot */
00123                 struct queue_item {
00124                         /* data size */
00125                         uint32 size;
00126 
00127                         /* buffer to store the data into */
00128                         char* data;
00129 
00130                         /* ptr to next queue item */
00131                         struct queue_item* next;
00132 
00133                         /* ptr to previous item */
00134                         struct queue_item* prev;
00135                 };
00136

00138                 /* queue's name */
